trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is directed to examine the body of an unbuffered message.
trans-unit.target: 时，将引发的异常<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>定向以检查未缓冲的消息的正文。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.NavigatorInvalidBodyAccessException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.NavigatorInvalidBodyAccessException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.NavigatorInvalidBodyAccessException"></xref>与指定的错误消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.NavigatorInvalidBodyAccessException"></xref> class with data that specifies the source and destination of the stream and the information required to serialize the exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.NavigatorInvalidBodyAccessException"></xref>类的指定的源和目标的流和序列化异常所需的信息的数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains all the data required to serialize the exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>包含序列化异常所需的所有数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that specifies the source and destination of the stream.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.NavigatorInvalidBodyAccessException"></xref> class with a specified error message and the inner exception that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.NavigatorInvalidBodyAccessException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和导致当前异常的内部异常的类。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that caused the current exception to be thrown.
